org.sd.cluster.io
Class Messenger

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.cluster.io.Messenger

public class Messenger
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class for (low-level) sending and receiving messages.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Method Detail

sendMessage

public Message sendMessage(Message message)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Send the given message over the socket and collect the response.

Parameters:
message - the message to send.
Returns:
the handled response (if it was successfully handled) or null if the message could not be sent or the response could not be received in the given time limit.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getReceiveTime

public long getReceiveTime()
Get the amount of time (in millis) taken to receive the message.

Returns:
the time to receive, or -1 if nothing has been received.

getResponseGenTime

public long getResponseGenTime()
Get the amount of time (in millis) taken to generate the response.

Returns:
the time to generate, or -1 if no response has been generated.

getSendTime

public long getSendTime()
Get the amount of time (in millis) taken to send the response.

Returns:
the time to send, or -1 if nothing has been sent.
